prompt:
split and rephrase each complex sentence in the input into multiple if/then statements that convey a simple sentence syntax structure

   An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.

###
completion: If an operator collects personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent. If an operator use personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If an operator disclose personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If a parent previously consents and an operator makes any material change to the collection practices, then operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If a parent previously consents and an operator makes any material change to the useage practices, then operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If a parent previously consents and an operator makes any material change to the disclosure practices, then operator must obtain verifiable parental consent. END
